Texts.Eng: Detected Droden unit registered to the Watchers. Logs indicate recent interaction with Commander Zaheed. Watcher armour received. ^green;This unit can trade ^orange;Avikan-fitted Watcher armour ^green;for ^orange;Watcher-themed Droden part replacements.^reset; Return with full set to complete trade.
Trade accepted. Handing over Watcher-themed Droden part replacements. Ending conversation.
